maintanance.title: We’ll Be Right Back!
maintanance.description: We’re currently performing some maintenance to improve your experience. This feature is temporarily unavailable. Please check back shortly.

guide.pick_role_desc: Assign Buster a job based on what you need—support, sales, booking, and more.
guide.hire_buster_desc: Final step! Choose a voice, assign a number, and go live.
guide.teach_buster_desc: Upload documents or share your business knowledge so Buster can learn what's important.
guide.interview_buster_desc: Answer a few simple questions so Buster understands your business and tone.

avoid-section.title: What to Avoid

step-3.title: Links to external content they won't be followed

step-6.title: Word docs with unnecessary formatting or signatures

avoid-section.description: These can confuse or break Buster's training:

include-section.title: What to Include

step-1.title: About Your Business
step-1.description: What you do, who you help, how you work

step-3.title: FAQs or Common Questions
step-3.description: Delivery time, booking process, refund policy, support hours

step-4.title: Scripts or Phone Replies You Use
step-4.description: Sample call greetings, how you explain things to customers

step-5.title: Special Offers or Promos
step-5.description: Anything you're running right now (discounts, seasonal deals)

include-section.description: These help Buster give accurate answers to your callers:

pro-tips-section.title: Pro Tips for Better Results
pro-tips-section.description: 1. Keep your writing clear and simple.
pro-tips-section.description-2: 2. Use bullet points or short paragraphs.
pro-tips-section.description-3: 3. Imagine you're writing for a new hire what do they need to know?

template-section.title: Example Template
template-section.description-2: We offer home and office cleaning in London.
template-section.description-3: Our services include deep cleaning, window washing, and weekly maintenance.
template-section.description-7: How long does a visit take? (Usually 2-3 hours)
template-section.description-8: Do you bring your own equipment? (Yes)
template-section.description-9: How do I reschedule? (Call or email 24 hours before)

item-1.title: What is the name of your Business

item-3.title: How should I respond if someone asks about prices?

item-5.title: How do you handle difficult callers?

what-buster-knows.title: What Buster Knows
what-buster-knows.description: Type important info, common questions, and anything Buster should know
what-buster-knows.placeholder:
Example:
- We offer plumbing services
- Open Mon–Sat, 9am–6pm
- Most common question: Do you charge call-out fees?
- Answer: First 30 mins are free
